ComicInfo.Summary:
After the shocking conclusion of last issue, Finder finds themselves undergoing some big changes, but there's no time to dwell on the past when they must test their luck against a group of assassins in Sigil's most famous casino! Will Finder escape with their life, or has their luck run out? Find out in the second issue of the series inspired by the newDungeons & Dragonssourcebook! Written byDungeons & Dragonsfan favorite Jim Zub with art by Jose Jaro.
